metadata.title: CVE-2018-4944 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 29.0.0.140 and earlier have an exploitable typeconfusion vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrarycode execution in the context of the current user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 29.0.0.171ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 29.0.0.171ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '29.0.0.171ubuntu0.16.04.1').
